HIDDENLIST_COMPENDIUMS.NAME: Hidden Compendiums
HIDDENLIST_COMPENDIUMS.HINT: List of compendiums to hide via the module.

HIDDENLIST_FOLDERS.NAME: Hidden Folders
HIDDENLIST_FOLDERS.HINT: Internal list of compendium folders to hide via the module.

SETTINGS.NOTES: Check the compendiums or folders you wish to hide in the Compendiums tab. Uncheck to show them again.

TEMPLATE.NO_COMPENDIUMS_OR_FOLDERS: No compendiums or folders found or accessible for configuration.
